Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Belmont and LaSalle
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Belmont and LaSalle due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Belmont and LaSalle due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Belmont, and,
  • between LaSalle and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#56 Milwaukee

#9 Ashland

#70 Division

#66 Chicago

#8 Halsted

#65 Grand

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
